unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about finding good hotels near the airport, right? It really depends on which airport, yaar! If you're talking about Mumbai's Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (BOM), then loads of options exist along Sahar Airport Rd, Vile Parle East. You'll find everything from budget hotels starting at around ₹2000/night to swanky 5-stars costing upwards of Rs. 15000.
normalised: Okay, so someone asked about finding good hotels near the airport, right? It really depends on which airport, yaar! If you're talking about Mumbai's Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (B-O-M), then loads of options exist along Sahar Airport Road, Vile Parle East. You'll find everything from budget hotels starting at around rupee two thousand per night to swanky five stars costing upwards of rupees fifteen thousand.

unnormalised: But, and this is a big but, traffic in Mumbai is crazy. So, even if the hotel claims to be "near" the airport, factor in at least 30 mins, maybe even 45 mins during peak hours (like 8 AM - 11 AM or 5 PM - 9 PM). Believe me, you don’t wanna miss your flight due to some messed-up traffic jam.

unnormalised: Now, if you're flying into Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport (DEL), the scene is a bit different. Aerocity, right next to Terminal 3, is jam-packed with hotels. The address of most would be something like Asset No 1, Hospitality District, Aerocity, New Delhi, Delhi 110037. Super convenient, especially if you have an early morning flight or a long layover. Expect to pay a premium though – rooms there are generally more expensive.

unnormalised: Another option near Delhi airport is Mahipalpur. It's slightly further away, maybe a 10-15 minute drive, but you'll find a lot more budget-friendly hotels there. Just be aware that the area can be a bit chaotic. Addresses there usually look something like Hotel XYZ, Near IGI Airport, NH 8, Mahipalpur, New Delhi 110037.

unnormalised: For Bangalore’s Kempegowda International Airport (BLR), you’re looking at hotels around Devanahalli. The drive from the city center is quite a distance, approx. 1.5 hrs usually, so booking something near the airport makes sense if you have an early flight. Search for hotels in and around areas like #32, Halanayakanahalli Rd, Devanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 562110.

unnormalised: Always, always check reviews online before you book. And make sure to confirm the exact address with the hotel after you've made the booking. Nothing worse than turning up at the wrong place at 3 AM! Consider using travel portals like MakeMyTrip, GoIbibo or Booking.com. They usually have verified addresses and customer reviews which can be a lifesaver!

unnormalised: Also, before booking, check that they have a free airport shuttle. It saves a lot on auto or taxi fares, especially early in the morning or late at night. A hotel address and contact details can be found on these websites. Good luck with your search!
